questions.question: わたしはまいにち（＿）のります。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～にのります - to ride (something)

じてんしゃ - bicycle

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「わたしはまいにちじてんしゃにのります」 means "I ride a bicycle every day."

  • じてんしゃ - missing necessary particle
  • じてんしゃで - "で" means "by", not used with のります
  • じてんしゃを - incorrect for のる
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is じてんしゃに.

  • じてんしゃ - missing necessary particle
  • じてんしゃで - "で" means "by", not used with のります
  • じてんしゃを - incorrect for のる

questions.question: つくえのうえ（＿）ほんがあります。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～にあります - used to show existence of objects at a location

つくえのうえ - on the desk

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「つくえのうえにほんがあります」 means "There is a book on the desk."

  • を - marks direct object
  • で - place where action happens, not existence
  • へ - direction marker
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is に.

  • を - marks direct object
  • で - place where action happens, not existence
  • へ - direction marker

questions.question: あの（＿）はせんせいですか。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

あの + noun - that [noun] over there

ひと - person

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「あのひとはせんせいですか」 means "Is that person a teacher?"

  • ひとが - wrong particle in noun phrase
  • ひとに - "to person", not appropriate here
  • ひとは - duplicate topic marker
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is ひと.

  • ひとが - wrong particle in noun phrase
  • ひとに - "to person", not appropriate here
  • ひとは - duplicate topic marker
